sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-row justify="center">
    <v-dialog
      v-model="dialog"
      persistent
      max-width="290"
      color="blue-grey darken-3"
      dark
    >
      <template v-slot:activator="{ on, attrs }">
        <v-btn color="error" fab small dark v-bind="attrs" v-on="on">
          <v-icon>mdi-trash-can</v-icon>
        </v-btn>
      </template>
      <v-card>
        <v-card-title class="text-h5">
          褒めポイントを削除しますか？
        </v-card-title>
        <v-card-actions>
          <v-spacer></v-spacer>
          <v-btn color="error" text @click="handleDeletePlacePoint()">
            削除する
          </v-btn>
          <v-btn color="green" text @click="dialog = false"> キャンセル </v-btn>
        </v-card-actions>
      </v-card>
    </v-dialog>
  </v-row>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: "DeleteDialogPlacePoint",
  data() {
    return {
      dialog: false,
    };
  },
  methods: {
    handleDeletePlacePoint() {
      this.$emit("delete-place-point");
      this.dialog = false;
    },
  },
};
</script>
